title: News24.com | Lockdown | Informal settlement dwellers feel the pinch as 2-week extension kicks in
description: Residents of the Lenasia South informal settlement say they are worried what impact the extended lockdown will have on their pockets.
content:
Residents of the Lenasia South informal settlement in Johannesburg say they are worried what impact the extended lockdown will have on their pockets. 
LIVE | All the latest coronavirus and lockdown updates
Many said they did not know where their next salary… [+3385 chars]
